product.name: Men Straight Carpenter Fit
product.description:
A modern slim with room to move, the 511 Slim Fit Stretch Jeans are a classic, you can wear with anything. Complete your casual wardrobe with a splash of style with these 511 slim fit jeans from Levi's. Cut in a cotton fabric with the right amount of stretch, these light blue jeans in solid pattern can be paired with most things to create a super cool outfit.

  •  These jeans sit low waist with a slim fit from hip to ankle.
  •  It is woven, with a hint of stretch, to deliver maximum comfort.
  •  Cut close to the body, the 511 Slim is a great alternative to the skinny jeans.

Composition and care

  • 98% Cotton 2% Elastane
  • Machine wash cold - normal cycle. Wash inside out with like colors, do not bleach, tumble dry low, warm iron, do not dry clean, do not iron decoration

 Additional Details

  • Country Of Origin: India
  •  Manufactured By: Arvind Limited Mysore Road 26/2 & 27/2; Kenchenahalli; 560059 Bangalore India Marketed By:\
  •  Marketed by: Levi Strauss India Pvt. Ltd; ITC Green Centre; Banaswadi Main Road; Maruthisevanagar; Bengaluru – 560005; India

product.description:

product.name: Ethnic Motifs Yoke Design Kurta
product.description:
This Brand bold and brilliant, ready to take on the world. Made of soft cotton and polyester fabric, this crew neck Top can be dressed up or down to fit any occasion. Regular fit makes it a great base layer.

  1. Stylish puff sleeves

product.name: Printed Block Heel Mules
product.description:
Put a stylish spin to your shoe closet with the Fashion Fabric's Sneakers. They are made from a high-quality pu blend upper and a TPR sole for a comfortable fit. Pair these Black sneakers with a trendy tee and well-tailored jeans for a day out with the girls.

Fit and sizing

  •  Closure type: Lace-up
  •  Suitable for casual wear 
  • Tip shape: Round

Additional Details

  •  Country of Origin: India Manufactured by: Levi's Footwear&Accessories (Ch) Sa, Stabile 2 Entr B, Via Alla Campagna 2B, 6934 Bioggio, Switzerland
  • Marketed by: Levi Strauss India Pvt. Ltd, ITC Green Centre, Banaswadi Main Road, Maruthisevanagar, Bengaluru Ð 560005, India

product.name: Boys Graphic Printed T-shirt
product.description:
Made from good quality pure cotton, this easygoing Fashion Fabric's t-shirt is perfect to add to your casual collection. Depending on how you want to play around with your style, you can layer it with shirts or wear it on its own with a pair of denim.

  •  Features a crew neck and a graphic pattern
  •  A regular fit provides comfort all day long
  •  Comes in the color white

 Fit and sizing

  •  Short Sleeves, Regular Fit
  •  Crew Neck, Pattren: Graphic

testimonial.name: James Smith
testimonial.message: I recently bought a summer dress from Fashion Fabircs and I'm absolutely in love with it! The quality is fantastic, and it fits perfectly. The customer service was top-notch, ensuring I received my order quickly and hassle-free. I’ve already received so many compliments and can't wait to shop here again. Highly recommend to all fashion lovers!

testimonial.name: Maria Garcia
testimonial.message: Shopping at Fashion Fabrics Store has been a delightful experience. The website is user-friendly, and the clothing selection is both trendy and diverse. My recent purchase, a stylish blazer, exceeded my expectations in both quality and fit. Delivery was swift, and the packaging was impressive. I'll definitely be coming back for more!

testimonial.name: Christopher Jones
testimonial.message: I’m so pleased with my new wardrobe additions! The fabrics are luxurious, and the designs are spot on with current trends. The size guide was accurate, and everything fits like a dream. The whole process from browsing to delivery was seamless. Highly recommend for anyone looking to update their closet

testimonial.name: Emily Taylor
testimonial.message: Fashion Fabric Store is a gem for fashion enthusiasts! I recently bought a beautiful evening dress, and it's even better in person. The fabric feels luxurious, and the fit is perfect. The entire shopping experience, from browsing to delivery, was smooth and enjoyable. I’m already planning my next purchase!

testimonial.name: Joseph Wilson
testimonial.message: Absolutely love! My new cardigan is cozy, stylish, and exactly what I was looking for. The quality is top-notch, and it arrived sooner than expected. Customer service was very responsive and helpful. This will definitely be my go-to for all future clothing purchases!

testimonial.name: Sophia White
testimonial.message: I had a fantastic shopping experience. The variety of styles available is impressive, and my new jacket is a standout piece in my wardrobe. It’s well-made and fits like a glove. The delivery was fast, and the packaging was eco-friendly. Can't wait to shop here again!
